scripts.build: webpack -d && cp src/index.html dist/index.html && webpack-dev-server --content-base src/ --inline
scripts.build:prod: webpack -p && cp src/index.html dist/index.html && cp src/images dist/images && node app.js
scripts.heroku-prebuild: export NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false; export NODE_ENV=; NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false NODE_ENV=development npm install --only=dev --dev
scripts.heroku-postbuild: export NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=true; export NODE_ENV=production; webpack -p && cp src/index.html dist/index.html&& cp src/images dist/images
